channel.title: Monero (XMR) GUI (Graphical User Interface) and CLI Debian Package - Testers Wanted!
channel.description:
Installation of Monero inside Whonix just got a lot easier.
Instructions can be found here:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Monero
Testers wanted!
(For instructions on how to install the package on Debian, see [here](https://github.com/Whonix/monero-gui).)
----
![256x256|256x256](upload://obsc9tAKFj3vey95d6AD70OEbkn.png)

item.title: Monero (XMR) GUI (Graphical User Interface) and CLI Debian Package - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Quote Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.1.3.4 - Point Release!

Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.1.3.4 - Point Release!

set environment variable QMLSCENE_DEVICE=softwarecontext (in VirtualBox, and after upgrades in KVM too) to workaround VM specific monero bug

Read full topic
item.source: Monero (XMR) GUI (Graphical User Interface) and CLI Debian Package - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Monero (XMR) GUI (Graphical User Interface) and CLI Debian Package - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Helia
item.description:
Do I understand correctly that from version 15.0.1.3.4 this workaround is no longer necessary and can be started normally?
The test showed normal CPU usage

Read full topic
item.source: Monero (XMR) GUI (Graphical User Interface) and CLI Debian Package - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Monero (XMR) GUI (Graphical User Interface) and CLI Debian Package - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Helia
item.description:
Read Patrick’s instructions: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Monero
Monero GUI has been included in the Whonix repository.
There is currently only one problem: You need to start it from the console with the command:

QMLSCENE_DEVICE=softwarecontext monero-wallet-gui

EDIT by Patrick:
fixed command

Read full topic
item.source: Monero (XMR) GUI (Graphical User Interface) and CLI Debian Package - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Monero (XMR) GUI (Graphical User Interface) and CLI Debian Package - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: mikelosat
item.description:
Sorry I do not understand, I have always read from Patrick’s instructions, to ensure maximum security of the platform, you must never modify it and install tools, because the Monero GUI is not inserted in the whonix repositories and do you suggest installing it manually?

Read full topic
item.source: Monero (XMR) GUI (Graphical User Interface) and CLI Debian Package - Testers Wanted!

item.title: Monero (XMR) GUI (Graphical User Interface) and CLI Debian Package - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Helia
item.description:
The result of my test:
Normal start from the menu - 100% CPU usage
Start via terminal QMLSCENE_DEVICE = softwarecontext monero-wallet-gui - no problems (2% - 10%)

Read full topic
item.source: Monero (XMR) GUI (Graphical User Interface) and CLI Debian Package - Testers Wanted!
